points.title: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time
points.status:
The privacy policy states only: "[...] we use log files. This information may include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, internet service provider (ISP), referring/exit pages, platform type, date/time stamp, and number of clicks to analyze trends, administer the site, track user's movement in the aggregate, and gather broad demographic information for aggregate use. However, none of the information stored in our log files, including but not limited to IP addresses, is linked to personally identifiable information."
No other information on anything, related to logs was found by me.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
points.status: "Third parties may also be placing and reading cookies on your browser, or using web beacons to collect information in the course of advertising being services on our website."

points.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you
points.status: "Cookies used on the mail.com website do not contain personally identifiable information."

points.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
points.status: The privacy policy states: "mail.com may use the personally identifiable information collected by mail.com to contact customers regarding products and services offered by mail.com and, to the extent the user has agreed to it, by its trusted affiliates, independent contractors and business partners."
